00017 #ifndef BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_ENUM_HPP_INCLUDED
00018 #define BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_ENUM_HPP_INCLUDED
00019 
00020 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/preprocessor.hpp"
00021 
00022 // BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(0,int): <nothing>
00023 // BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(1,int): int
00024 // BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(2,int): int, int
00025 // BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(n,int): int, int, .., int
00026 
00027 #if !defined(BOOST_MPL_NO_OWN_PP_PRIMITIVES)
00028 
00029 #   include "boost/preprocessor/cat.hpp"
00030 
00031 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(n, param) \
00032     BOOST_PP_CAT(BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_,n)(param) \
00033     
00034     
00035 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_0(p)
00036 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_1(p) p
00037 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_2(p) p,p
00038 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_3(p) p,p,p
00039 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_4(p) p,p,p,p
00040 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_5(p) p,p,p,p,p
00041 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_6(p) p,p,p,p,p,p
00042 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_7(p) p,p,p,p,p,p,p
00043 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_8(p) p,p,p,p,p,p,p,p
00044 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM_9(p) p,p,p,p,p,p,p,p,p
00045 
00046 #else
00047 
00048 #   include "boost/preprocessor/comma_if.hpp"
00049 #   include "boost/preprocessor/repeat.hpp"
00050 
00051 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_AUX_ENUM_FUNC(unused, i, param) \
00052     BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(i) param \
00053     
00054 
00055 #   define BOOST_MPL_PP_ENUM(n, param) \
00056     BOOST_PP_REPEAT_1( \
00057           n \
00058         , BOOST_MPL_PP_AUX_ENUM_FUNC \
00059         , param \
00060         ) \
00061     
00062 
00063 #endif // BOOST_MPL_NO_OWN_PP_PRIMITIVES
00064 
00065 #endif // BOOST_MPL_AUX_PREPROCESSOR_ENUM_HPP_INCLUDED
